articles.title: Mandhana stars as India inflict record loss on England
articles.description: Smriti Mandhana scores a stunning century as India inflict England's heaviest T20 defeat by runs with a comprehensive 97-run triumph at Trent Bridge.
articles.content:

articles.title: Fresher start to the week but heat retuning for some parts of the UK
articles.description: After last week's heatwave temperatures have dropped a bit, but the heat should  start to build again by the end of the week.
articles.content:
Even though the fresher feel on Monday might make you think that we've "had our summer", the reality is that temperatures are now actually closer to the seasonal average around 17C to 24C (63-75F).
